Title: Prohibits monitoring of gas and electric meters any more frequently than on a monthly or billing cycle basis
Summary: Prohibits the monitoring, collection, recording or storing of data from gas and electric meters any more frequently than on a monthly or billing cycle basis, unless the express written consent of the consumer has been provided; and requires the consent of the property owner for entry upon residential property.
LawCode: Amd ยง65, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to prohibiting the monitoring of natural gas or electricity meters more frequently than on a monthly or billing cycle basis and entry upon residential property
